issue.title: [C++] Substrait ProjectRel is interpreted incorrectly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16989](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16989). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A Substrait ProjectRel appends columns to the dataset, while the consumer currently interprets it as if it replaces the existing columns (i.e. what Acero does).
